history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: msum_unit,Op,Zp_mult,Z_Zp. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_is_ring,msum_unit,Op,Zp_mult,Z_Zp.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 The term "Z_Zp -> Z_Zp -> Z_Zp" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "monoid_theory ?m ?u".

In environment S : Set p : nat z0 : Z_Zp -> Z_Zp -> Z_Zp z : Z_Zp H : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall n : nat, msum m u n (fun _ : nat => u) = u Hp : p = 0 -> False H0 : forall x, x ⊕ ∸ x = Zp Unable to unify "?M1628 ⊕ ∸ ?M1628 = Zp" with "monoid_theory z0 z".

original: apply (msum_unit (Z_Zp -> Z_Zp -> Z_Zp) Zp_mult Op). apply Zp_is_ring.
